title: INfinance
description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: I held power of attorney for my late brother. Can I withdraw money from his bank account to give to his favorite charity?
items.description: ‘He honestly believed the power of attorney was also the beneficiary of this account, so a beneficiary was not listed’

items.title: I begged my adviser to sell amid the market turmoil. He dragged his feet and I lost $20,000. Do I have any recourse?
items.description: “If he had moved my money out of the market weeks ago, much of my loss could have been prevented.”

items.title: How Trump’s tariffs could leave the Fed at risk of triggering stagflation
items.description: Appeasing Trump would require the Fed to abandon its 2% inflation target. Pressure is mounting for that.
